short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn about your viewers at an intimate level with LCM. Filter youTube comments based on keywords or topic. View Top Fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create your account at  https://app.livecommentmanager.com/signup/start

With LCM, you can isolate comments on YouTube videos and filter comments, real-time during live events,  You can also add users as "Top Fans" and youâ€™ll get to solo all comments that fan.

Are you a content creator looking to create a new membership/Patreon tier?  Live Comment Manager's ability to identify and prioritize comments from top fans could allow a streamer to create a new Patreon tier focused on enhanced interactivity. For instance, subscribers in this tier might receive the privilege of being tagged as "Top Fans," ensuring their comments are highlighted during live streams. This can lead to more direct and personal interactions, potentially making this tier appealing for fans who want closer engagement and recognition in the streaming community. This feature could effectively be marketed as an exclusive benefit, adding value to the higher subscription tiers on Patreon.
